A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely awesome movie. I went through a range of emotions and was blown away by every part of this movie. I'm a huge fan of star wars \, but i never go into a movie with expectations. My thought is \, anything can happen at any time\, with a certain point of view. This movie allows us to use our imagination and give us the power to open our minds and see what we want to see. I love movies that make us think\, makes us feel \, and make us want more.
